title: Squirrel on a wire part - b

content.question: At what time in the interval 0≤t≤18 is the squirrel farthest from building A? How far from building A is the squirrel at this time?

frqParts.text: At what time in the interval 0≤t≤18 is the squirrel farthest from building A? How far from building A is the squirrel at this time?

topic.text: 5.5: Using the Candidates Test to Determine Absolute (Global) Extrema
